mapper.select: SELECT m_nick, h_pic FROM cy_member m JOIN cy_home h ON m.m_id = h.m_id WHERE m.m_id = #{id}

SELECT m.m_nick, h.h_pic, v.v_num, v.v_text, to_char(v.v_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as v_time, v.host_id as v_hostId, v.guest_id as v_guestId FROM cy_visit v JOIN cy_member m ON v.guest_id = m.m_id JOIN cy_home h ON h.m_id = m.m_id WHERE host_Id= #{id} ORDER BY v.v_num DESC OFFSET #{startItem} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{itemsPerPage} ROWS ONLY
SELECT m_id FROM cy_member WHERE m_id = #{id}
SELECT count(*) FROM cy_visit where host_id =#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cy_visit (v_num,v_text,v_time,host_id,guest_id) VALUES (SEQ_cy_visit_v_num.nextval,#{v_text},systimestamp at time zone 'Asia/Seoul',#{v_hostId},#{v_guestId})
